amendment.description: An amendment numbered 336 printed in the Congressional Record directing the Director of the Congressional Budget Office and the Commissioner of the Bureau of Labor Statistics to study the effect of this Act not later than 90 days of its enactment.

action.text: Mr. Aderholt raised a point of order against the Bishop (NY) amendment (A103). stating that the amendment seeks to change existing law and constitutes legislation in an appropriation bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
